𓊃 𓎡 𓂋||Zakhurn|Saturn Zakhara ! ← Sahara? / Zurvãn = Saturn: Venus as a boy!

𓊃𓎡𓂋 Zurvãn(saturn) Venus as a boy! VAN:1th/5th planet (Zoroastrians) Janus deep
Zoroastrians of ancient Persia knew Saturn as the heaven-sustaining Zurvãn
Zurvãn "the King and Lord of the Long Dominion."
Kronos is presented as the father and Zeus as his son who dethrones him.
⇔ Sabbath ⇔ Seth? / Saturni dies, "Saturn's day."
The same day passed into the Anglo-Saxon calendar as the "day of Seater" !!
Distinguished it from our Sun by calling it best sun, the primeval sun, the central sun.

Mo=1,Di=2,Mi=3,Don=4,Fr=5,Sa=6,So=7 (Modern+Chinese) VS
So=1,Mo=2,Di=3,Mi=4,Don=5,Fr=6,SABTur=7 (Semitic+Turk+___) VS
Di=1,Mi=2,Do=3,Fr=4,SAM=5,So=6,Mo=0/7 / Mo'day ⋍ Mi'day / Di ⋍ Do / Don ⋍ Sam (Nowhere?)
